channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- ThinkPad Active Protection System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- ThinkPad Active Protection System

item.title: CVE-2017-3756|2024-09-16T19:36:23.552Z -- lenovo%20group%20ltd. -- thinkpad%20active%20protection%20system
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability was identified in Lenovo Active Protection System for ThinkPad systems versions earlier than 1.82.0.17. An attacker with local privileges could execute code with administrative privileges via an unquoted service path.
